text: Edward Porter Alexander (May 26, 1835 â€“ April 28, 1910) was an engineer, an officer in the U.S. Army, a Confederate general in the American Civil War, and later a railroad executive, planter, and author. ==Other websites== *Inventory of the Edward Porter Alexander Papers, 1852-1910, in the Southern Historical Collection, UNC-Chapel Hill *Photographs of Alexander Category:1835 births Category:1910 deaths Category:Confederate Army generals Category:Military people from Georgia (U.S. state)
title: Edward Porter Alexander
